text: "Marvins Room" is a song by Canadian musician Drake. It is a dark and emotional song that tells a story of heartache, and a failed relationship. It is off his album Take Care. The song was so successful many artists made their own versions of the song, including: Lil Wayne, Chris Brown, JoJo, Trey Songz. In the song, Drake drunk dials an ex-girlfriend of his. He mentions to her that she can do better than the man that she is in a current relationship with and expresses the feelings he still has for her. He mentions how he has a hard time adjusting to the fame he has garnered from the success of his career. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2011 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs Category:Rhythm and blues ballads
title: Marvins Room
